title: GLUE WORK Is the Backbone of Open Source, But We’re Still Not Measuring It
content:
Would a software development project be successful if everyone on the team spent their workday working on feature development? No, it would not.  Developing and maintaining a large-scale software system...

The post GLUE WORK Is the Backbone of Open Source, But We’re Still Not Measuring It appeared first on CHAOSS.
